atoms.title: Modify List Item Layout
atoms.text: You may be wondering, why do we refer to the image as `@mipmap/ic_launcher` (instead of `@drawable/ic_launcher`). The app icon is in the res/mipmap folder (instead of the res/drawable folder) because Android handles app icons in a special way. Android wants your app icon to be crisp and clear, regardless of the device, so on some large screen devices, Android use a higher-resolution version of the icon compared to other icons in your app for that device. For more details, check out this article. You can refer to the image in the same way that you refer to images in the drawable folder, except the resource type is called mipmap. Example: ``` ```

atoms.title: Visual Polish
atoms.instructor_notes:
Download the Miwok app redlines here! This .pdf file contains redlines on the categories screen, the numbers screen, and the phrases screen. The family and colors screens should mimic the numbers screen with the exception of their background color, specified in the category screen redlines. **Hints:** Layout weight (from the last course) These are the changes needed to complete the quiz.
